LaTeX Inline

Let us consider ϕ(x)\phi(x)ϕ(x), a real-valued PDF.

The question we ask is: What is the range of values that have a probability ≥γ\geq\gamma≥γ (across samplings of NNN values) of appearing in the sample?

LaTeX block

We can derive that the values x∈Rx \in \mathbb{R}x∈R that are in range, follow the equation:

ϕ(x)≥1−1−γN\phi(x) \geq 1 - \sqrt[N]{1 - \gamma} ϕ(x)≥1−N1−γ​
